text: *Permission scope issue?* A user is experiencing difficulty installing our app. The screenshots shared by their administrator indicate that the *permission scope appears to be correct based on what the app needs*. Iâ€™m seeking a potential solution to this issue. Thank you in advance!!

[ERROR] A HubSpotAuthError has occurred. Error while retrieving new access token:
Also when I try to use hs auth, it skips through so quickly I can't say "y" or enter the auth.

Hi Ace,

I hope you are well today.

HubSpot is presently experiencing a major outage/fluctuating service across all tools which may be the reason for this. Please <https://status.HubSpot.com/|click here to review the current status>, you can also <https://status.HubSpot.com/#subscribe-modal-q4ys0bw4tqr5|subscribe to the notification> at the top of the page so you're updated when everything is resolved to try again.

Hope this helps! :simple_smile:
Hi Krishna, what sort of bulk action would you want to perform?
